summary: This is an email from November 6, 2021, regarding the transmission of defense materials in the case of United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. It includes cover letters and indices for the defense, and indicates the materials are being uploaded to USAfx and prepared for physical delivery to Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell; defense materials are being prepared for her.

events.title: Transmission of Defense Materials for Maxwell
events.description: An email is sent coordinating the upload of defense materials to USAfx and the preparation of a physical drive for delivery to Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated November 6, 2021, concerning the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
It references the transmission of defense materials, including cover letters and indices, via USAfx and physical delivery.
The email indicates ongoing legal proceedings and discovery sharing between the prosecution and defense in late 2021.
